alert.note: Alert for Inland Glynn; Wayne (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 18 at 6:17PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Glynn and southeastern Wayne Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 617 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of Gardi to near Dock Junction. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Everett, Thalmann and Mount Pleasant. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
